Hi! Iâ€™m Lewis, a theoretical physicist with a long standing passion for computer science.
This website was initially going to be a short project to help me start learning HTML/JavaScript, however I was having so much fun that I decided to finish it and use it as a nexus of all the places you can find me online.

Type HELP for a list of commands.

help.response:
For more info on a specific command type HELP [command]
Command list:
CV        View my current resume
GIT       Go to my GitHub
LINK      Go to my LinkedIn
MSG       Leave me a message
HELP      Display command list
help.help:
Displays help information on all commands.

    Displays help information on given command

cv.help: Load a copy of my current resume in this window
